{"medsNode":"court_4","medsPercent":0,"medsPriority":0,"Description":"You step into a dust-choked chamber lined with a massive stone shelf, its weight bowed under ancient tomes. Scrolls and parchment litter the floor, faded fragments of centuries-old vampire research.

After some digging, you uncover a handful of scrolls that might prove useful. You also find a small altar in the deepest end of the chamber. A halo of celestial light descends upon it.","DescriptionAction":"The altar bathed in holy light seems the perfect place to purify the cursed badge of {"medsNode":"court_4","medsPercent":0,"medsPriority":1,"Description":"You step into a dust-choked chamber lined with a massive stone shelf, its weight bowed under ancient tomes. Scrolls and parchment litter the floor, faded fragments of centuries-old vampire research.

Most of the books are written in scripts you can't read, and others spiral into maddening complexity.

Still, after some digging, you uncover a handful of scrolls that might prove useful.","DescriptionAction":"What will you do?","EventIconShader":"None","EventID":"e_court4","EventName":"Scrolls and
